Register function takes four arguments that are functions used in the registration process. Use these functions to register the following components:
`register_xslt_function`: Register Python functions that will be accessed in the XSLT files using the prefix `proteus-utils:`
`register_qwebchannel_class`: Register Python classes that can be accessed from QWebEngineView.
`register_proteus_component`: Register general purpose `Proteuscomponent` classes.
`register_export_strategy`: Register an export strategy.
Example of plugins root package: ``` python from basics.proteus_xslt_basics import generate_markdown, image_to_base64, current_document from basics.proteus_xslt_basics import ProteusBasicMethods from basics.document_interactions import DocumentInteractions from basics.impact_analyzer import ImpactAnalyzer from basics.export.export_html import ExportHTML from basics.export.export_pdf import ExportPDF
def register(register_xslt_function, register_qwebchannel_class, register_proteus_component, register_export_strategy):
# Document Interactions register_qwebchannel_class("documentInteractions", DocumentInteractions)
# Impact analyzer register_proteus_component("impactAnalyzer", ImpactAnalyzer, ["_calculate_impact"])
# XSLT basics register_xslt_function("generate_markdown", generate_markdown) register_xslt_function("image_to_base64", image_to_base64) register_xslt_function("current_document", current_document)
register_qwebchannel_class("proteusBasics", ProteusBasicMethods)
# Export strategies register_export_strategy("pdf", ExportPDF) register_export_strategy("html", ExportHTML) ```
